snippet: President Hugo Chávez has taken a sharp turn for the worse, nearly 12 weeks after undergoing cancer surgery, a government official said Monday.
abstract: Venezuelan government official says Pres Hugo Chavez has taken sharp turn for worse, nearly 12 weeks after undergoing cancer surgery.
lead_paragraph: President Hugo Chávez has taken a sharp turn for the worse, nearly 12 weeks after undergoing cancer surgery, a government official said Monday.

headline.main: Venezuela: Chávez’s Condition Worsens, Official Says
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: Chávez’s Condition Worsens, Official Says
